attributes.additional_details: The quality of home learning does not compare to children learning in school. The missed time in education will without doubt effect their long term futures. Social isolation is not natural and how this will effect our children is not known. Furthermore many working people will struggle with childcare if children are home.
attributes.background: To keep schools open during lockdown to protect the long term future of our children, their education and their mental well being.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558050
